dataUnits

Interface IDataUnitCorpus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataUnit, IReadable, IReadableXML, ISaveableXML
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorpusImpl

    public interface IDataUnitCorpus
extends IDataUnit
    Interface with main methods for the document corpus
    Author:
    Pdz
